title: Veterans Day
teaser: Dee Perry salutes the troops for Veterans Day with stories of United States veterans found in the pages of a trio of acclaimed books.  Anisfield-Wolf Book Award winner Kevin Powers explains the inspiration behind his Iraq War novel - The Yellow Birds.  Bestselling author Karl Marlantes shares his Vietnam War story Matterhorn.  And we hear the tale of a World War One flying ace from Cleveland - David S. Ingalls - whose story is told in the book Hero of the Angry Sky.
